text: Lev Borisovich Kamenev (born Leo Rosenfeld or Lev Borisovich Rozenfeld; â€“ 25 August 1936) was one of the leaders of the Russian Revolution in Russia. He was in office from 6 July 1923 to 16 January 1926.
